mapper.update: update user set con1=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id,u.role_id,u.username,u.password,u.address, u.phone,u.create_user_id,u.create_time,u.user_renew_id,u.renew_time, r.id AS rid,r.username AS rusername,r.user_power,r.parent_id,r.create_user_id,r.create_time AS rcreatetime, r.user_renew_id,r.renew_time AS rrenewtime, p.id AS pid , p.role_id ,p.can_use,p.create_user_id,p.create_time AS pcreatetime,p.user_renew_id, p.renew_time AS prenewtime FROM USER u INNER JOIN role r ON u.role_id=r.id INNER JOIN POWER p ON r.user_power=r.id AND r.id=p.id where u.username=#{username} and u.password=#{password}
